Articles.Content:
I was wondering what is the minimum altitude above Kerbin to receive High Kerbin Science. I'm doing a mission (actually right as I am righting this message:cool:) and I want to get as much science as possible. Thanks in advance

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-06T16:07:23Z" title="05/06/2015 04:07  PM" data-short="9 yr">May 6, 2015</time> by Branjoman**

250km

This page has the boundary information for all the planets and moons: [http://wiki.kerbalspaceprogram.com/wiki/Science](http://wiki.kerbalspaceprogram.com/wiki/Science)
